General.Name: Franbo Lines
General.Description: Franbo Lines Corp. provides ocean transport and shipping agency services through bulk and general cargo vessels in Taiwan and internationally. Its operating and forwarding business focuses on the transportation of steel materials, logs, chemical products, and mechanic equipment primarily through Asia and Pacific Regions. The company also owns and charters ocean going, far east, and near-ocean vessels to Japanese shipping companies, as well as offers freight forwarding services. It also integrates the resources of various external units, such as the supply chain of the ship spare parts division, the insurance and notary firms, and the long-term cooperation with port agents. In addition, it offers vessel management services, which include safety, international ship security, and manning management services. Further, the company is involved in the long- and short-term vessel chartering, and freight brokering businesses, as well as provision of technical, marine supply, ship inspection, crew management, material supply, shipping arrangement, insurance claim services, and port agencies. Franbo Lines Corp. was founded in 1998 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
